## Reaction Engineering, Ethics, and Safety {.cc}

Class 1 defines reaction engineering. Codes of engineering ethics are presented and the importance of safety in chemical processing is stressed.

## Learning Outcomes {.ch}

After completing Class 1 you should...

* Know the definition/defining equation for reaction engineering
* Understand
    * the AIChE Code of Ethics
    * process safety is paramount in the practice of reaction engineering

## Prepare {.ch} 

* Read Chapter 1 of REB, The Book
* Watch the Class 1 Preparation Video

## Participate {.ch}

* Attend Virtual Class 1

## Practice {.ch}

* Complete the Class 1 Practice Assignment
